test.name: Visitor should be able enter site

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Verify Page Loaded
kw.doc: Verify all pages successfully loaded

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

test.doc: All pages in website should be integrated with others
test.status:
Several failures occurred:
1) Element 'css=div[id='services']' not visible after 5 seconds.
2) Element 'css=div[id='portfolio']' not visible after 5 seconds.

suite.doc: This test file includes all tests for *kariyer.baykartech.com*, if you wanna change Browser or Runtime Language go to *Variables* section in this file.
